import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Shield, Globe, Server, Settings, Activity, Zap, Cpu, Network } from 'lucide-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; interface LayoutProps { children: React.ReactNode; activeTab?: string; onTabChange?: (tab: string) => void; } const Layout: React.FC = ({ children }) => { const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(() => { // Check localStorage for user preference return localStorage.getItem('theme') === 'dark'; }); useEffect(() => { if (darkMode) { document.body.classList.remove('light'); document.body.classList.add('dark'); localStorage.setItem('theme', 'dark'); } else { document.body.classList.remove('dark'); document.body.classList.add('light'); localStorage.setItem('theme', 'light'); } }, [darkMode]); return (
